name: Black Mansion
description:
Challenge Mode

  • You can play challenge mode from 2-5 stage clear
  • You can challenge the various stages with different rooms
  • Level that can be upgraded at each stage


Collect

  • A memo that tells the story
  • Costume to change the character's look
  • Artifacts required to acquire a costume

Distinctive characters

  • There are various stories of the various characters in one mansion.
  • Experience how their stories end.

Various kinds of traps

  • A hasty judgment can only lead to death.
  • Unexpected traps will make you not let go of the tension even for a second.

Caution

  • If you remove this app, all the data you have done so far will be removed as well.
